data.text: @atthehip That’s very interesting! The nerve pain and fizzy feet I developed after Covid has mostly gone away since my first dose too.
@tired_elle I hope the second shot continues to improve your symptoms.
@tired_elle I’m glad to hear things are getting better for you.

@getserious1234 I’m so sorry, that’s awful and there’s not a lot of room to feel worse with Long Covid. For a few months there I thought my body was actually dying, I was completely bed/couch bound. This improvement is a huge shock.
@tired_elle AZ did nothing for me.  If anything my symptoms are worse.  Good luck!

@Tania67356445 @tired_elle This is what worries me. Is not having ANY symptoms a bad thing when getting vaccinated?
 
We should find out amongst us on Twitter how many people experienced no symptoms getting one of each

@tired_elle Both mRNA vaccines are basically the same.  May have a stronger side effect but not necessarily.  I had a bit more sore arm and fatigue for 4 days.  Better than getting/spreading COVID.  I hope all goes well and congrats on your 2nd dose 😷💉🛑🦠👍🏼
@tired_elle Also Vitamin E helps the tiredness. You may want to try it or add almonds to your diet
@tired_elle If they offered Moderna just walk away. You can do it like many people.

@tired_elle Just got mine today - both were being offered. 
Same at Fortius, Convention centre
@Kristy91808800 @WorriedTeacher3 I’m in Kelowna, I’m hoping because my child is due for theirs and we are goi t together - that we will both get Pfizer.
@tired_elle Can you get a medical note??
@WorriedTeacher3 @tired_elle If you can get to the Pan pacific hotel  /trade& convention centre they don’t seem to be  mixing doses. Someone also said South Surrey Rex center asks you
@moonshot_ideas @tired_elle Sorry it was two weeks ago, what is time
@moonshot_ideas @tired_elle Yeah, last week I got Pfizer after my first shot also being Pfizer. I went to the convention center

@tired_elle Same boat. 

My mom got 1 of each and had barely any symptoms for her second shot of Moderna

My brother had fever body aches after his second moderna shot (moderna 2x)

Idk I get the feeling you’re not supposed to mix
@tired_elle I went to the Vancouver Convention Centre for my second dose and was pleasantly surprised that they had both Pfizer and Moderna and gave you the right one based on your vax card.
